website_summaries.verdict: If you know a creative child who loves to make their art shine, this craft set will ensure that every new doodle is a sparkly one for a long time to come.
pros: Includes 5 sparkly glues, 5 glittery chalk sticks, 8 glittery crayons, a glittery marker, construction paper, and more glittery craft supplies
cons: It’s not the most durable case

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but doesn’t include all pieces listed in description
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. But it doesn’t have metallic crayons, which the description said it would. And there is only one glitter marker, not three as described. Bought it as a gift, and recipient won’t know the difference, but I’m always disappointed when the item doesn’t match the written description.
customer_reviews.author: AOB512

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a gift but where’s the blue one?
customer_reviews.text: Great set but I am giving it 3 stars Why can’t there be a “boy” glitter set that is blue or green or maybe even make it yellow to be neutral. Boys like glitter too but don’t always want a PINK case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing a pen
customer_reviews.text: Everything else was wonderful except the glitter pen was not included. Packaging was fine so it must have been an oversite somewhere in the factory. It wasn't worth returning for such a small part but a bummer in an otherwise good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Valary Smith

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL  GIFT FOR CRAFTY CHILD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my six-year-old granddaughter, who loves to draw and make things, and so much the better if they glisten! She loved this gift, and still uses it. Pink and purple are favorite colors, so the pink box was perfect. If I had been looking for such a set for a boy I might have preferred a different color container - maybe red?
customer_reviews.author: S. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was thrilled but glitter pen ran out first day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $4 worth of crayons/markers
customer_reviews.text: The only thing "Frozen 2" about this item is the picture on the outside of the box. I could have bought the same coloring material at the dollar store for under $5. The $15 cost difference isn't worth it. It's just markers, crayons and some paper. I thought it would have more Frozen branded items inside. Like the crayons would have images from the movie on the paper, or something. But nope. Not worth the $20 or so I spent on it. Next time I'll just go to the dollar store and buy coloring material.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Marker 'stamps' Not Markers A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: If your kids love frozen they will probably like this. I almost returned this because of what seemed to be dried up markers. And I didn't find any stamps. Then I re-read the description and it said "8 stampers". These were the Markers! there are stamps on the tip of the markers This set is slightly different than others because of this, the glitter glue, the stickers and coloring pages, and stamps, but really it is quite expensive Just so you can have a frozen themed set... Unfortunately the crayons are not really glittery when you write with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift, and you cannot beat this set for the cost, The little girl was so happy and played with is for hours the day i gave it to Her
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle and shine!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift for anyone who loves a bit of sparkle and shine! My daughter and I have been really enjoying all of the products in this adorable case. I particularly like the silver marker. This was about the same price as just buying the chalk around Easter for some reason, and I’m glad the bunny found this.
customer_reviews.author: LilLJStuff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter art set for preschool/kindergarten aged kids!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid loves the Frozen movie franchise and doing arts and crafts, then this is the perfect gift for them! The kit is perfect for the preschool/kindergarten age and includes some coloring pages and glitter crayons (yay!!!). My kids particularly loved the Crayola markers that were stamps! They had stamp shapes like snowflakes, Christmas trees, and more!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your coronacation!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and have been left unemployed and bored by the current pandemic, this is perfect for your inner child or actual child! I used this set to create and color some cute rainbows to hang in my window since that’s the trend now. And the chalk was perfect for some outside social distance fun! The glitter adds a even cuter aspect to it and it’s small enough to not have to worry about clean up
customer_reviews.author: jade m.

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: They decided to keep it in my car where they could use it while I was driving. They have created many art projects with and and still enjoy opening it when ever we are in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Glitteriffic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old’s birthday, and she was stoked! She loves glitter and art supplies. She immediately busted out her coloring books so we could color pretty pictures. She and dad used the sidewalk chalk the next day, and I was impressed with just how much glitter was in them.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: A no for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Crayola fan. I have two daughters. And they love arts and crafts. However when opening the glitter glue pens none of them worked. It would have been just best if I had gone to the store and purchased the things that she wanted. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmermaid85

customer_reviews.title: and my grandson aged 4 love this set
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is 8, and my grandson aged 4 love this set. She has always liked anything "sparkly" so we have great times together creating works of art. The little guy loved drawing on the patio with the caulk, which was a great addition to this set. The quality is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Fufu Goose

customer_reviews.title: Crayola glitter set
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable set and I know my daughter will love it. She hasn’t opened it yet since it will be a Christmas gift but she will enjoy using this to create super cute arts and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good for about a week
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with product at first. Within a week or so the markers started drying up and quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas williams

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift
customer_reviews.text: It was part of a gift for a 6 year-old Frozen fan and she loved it. She couldn't wait to get home to begin to use it. She would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Dickonson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves glittery things. This was just the gift for her birthday. Very nice sturdy case to use and add more markers, etc. too. She liked that she would color her own stickers and then use.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Read contents closely - doesn't come with much
customer_reviews.text: For the price, i expected more to be in the box, but no. I feel ripped off. Bought for my daughter, and felt bad it wasn't a better gift with more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaH

customer_reviews.title: Need a little more.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughters. They enjoy it but there's not a lot in there. Could have put a little bit more in the case. Just saying They enjoyed it so I'm happy for them
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Supervision with glitter glue
customer_reviews.text: Very giftable. I took out the glitter glue just because it was a young girls gift and gave that to her parents separate. Otherwise great deal and very happy little girl!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Albright

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are misleading. It’s worth about $7. The construction paper is a quarter of the size, which in some pictures is shown as the same size as the sticker sheet. And in another picture they show the box of chalk as well as the chalk out of the box but it looks like 2 different items. You would be better off buying the items separately. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dollar store
customer_reviews.text: these items i this box is not worth the cost. the items you can find on Wal-Mart. the box is plain with a cover picture on it. the coloring pads are paper the size of a small writing pad. when the child paint the picture it is too wet to do any thing with. it is DIFFIANTLY NOT WORTH THE MONEY. GO TO THE DOLLAR STORE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Baskerville

customer_reviews.title: It was okay.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was not very excited to recieve this. It was a lot more bland and empty than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: Glittery fun
customer_reviews.text: Great art protect box!!!! Lots of great stuff in a reusable glitter case so kids can keep all their stuff together
customer_reviews.author: pyxiegirlz

customer_reviews.title: Great art gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for kids who love art, wish there was a blue box rather than the pink box!seems to be missing one item within the pictures but the kid loves the glitter!
customer_reviews.author: Starr Z

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring set
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, best part is when they are finished with it, they put all back in its case. No mess
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps giving
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this... no idea where I’m supposed to put all these drawings now though:
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Glitter!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy 2 bc my kids don’t like to share. They love this item so much. They specially like the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Pakravan

customer_reviews.title: My girls love them
customer_reviews.text: Looses one star because the glitter glue caps beak easily. Otherwise really cute set.
customer_reviews.author: shannon o.

customer_reviews.title: Fun all in one.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved this art kit and I like having everything together in a kit.

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: bought for y granddaughter when she was sick and it kept her busy for hours... great buy

customer_reviews.title: Glitter glue used once and was empty.
customer_reviews.text: Glitter glue used once and was empty. Other items in the kit will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The package came with everything advertised. The paper is literally just plain construction paper cut in quarters. The case is solid though! It doesn’t accidentally pop open.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift but the birthday girl (8 years old) loved it.

customer_reviews.title: fabulous gift
customer_reviews.text: ordered and received in great time, best prices excellent gift ty very much

customer_reviews.text: Purchased to go into an art box I'm making for my granddaughter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel
customer_reviews.text: All self contained in a carry case. Great for a 6 year old as gift.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product!!! I got it for my 5 year olds Christmas art set. She was thrilled with her first "big girl art kit"! In a house of artists, we were very happy with it! It has super cute customizable stickers and great quality crayons, not to mention the adorable glittery pieces!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, no regrets

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it!

product_meta.title: Crayola All That Glitters Art Case Coloring Set, Toys, Gift for Kids Age 5+
product_meta.description: Style:All That GlittersKids will delight in adding a bit of sparkle to their artwork with the Crayola All That Glitters Art Case Coloring Set. This complete art case for kids features a glittery take on old favorites. From glitter crayons and glitter chalk to glitter glue sticks and a glitter marker, The possibilities are endless. Create glitter stickers with a color-your-own sticker sheet, or make something from scratch with 3 different colors of construction paper. When it's time to clean up, pack it all away in the durable and portable glitter case. This craft kit makes a great gift for artists ages 5 and older.
feature_bullets: Includes 1 Crayola All That Glitters Art Case Coloring Set with 8 glitter crayons, 5 glitter glue tubes, 5 glitter chalk sticks, 1 glitter marker, 1 color-your-own sticker sheet, and 30 sheets of construction paper
A durable, portable case helps keep art supplies organized, even on-the-go.
Bring a sparkly touch to classic art supplies with glitter crayons, chalk, and glue.
Make any number of crafts for kids, including unique glitter stickers with the color-your-own sticker sheet.
Safe and non-toxic, this craft kit makes a great gift for girls and boys ages 5 and up.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,725 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
